thread.title: Wall Street suffers biggest two-day drop since 2016

title: Wall Street suffers biggest two-day drop since 2016
text:
Wall Street suffers biggest two-day drop since 2016 2:40am IST - 01:21 
The Dow Jones Industrials racked up their worst two-day stock market slump since September 2016 as inflation fears pushed government debt interest rates to four-year highs. Conway G. Gittens reports.   
The Dow Jones Industrials racked up their worst two-day stock market slump since September 2016 as inflation fears pushed government debt interest rates to four-year highs. Conway G. Gittens reports.  //reut.rs/2nsH4f7
